title: Park + Vine
description: Described as the "general store of the future," Park + Vine offers a wide variety of sustainable merchandise that minimizes the use of natural resources and animal byproducts. Store is divided in two with dry goods such as reusable bottles, bags and food carriers, non-toxic cleaning supplies, natural baby and parenting supplies on one side, and a neighborhood green grocery with a lunch counter on the other that serves food.
